item.title: Persistent flooding on Old Gloucester Road (B4634) creating serious danger to road users and pedestrians - unresolved, 15th February
item.description:

Could you please confirm: • whether any works or inspections have been carried out, • whether remedial action is planned, and • the approximate timescale for a permanent solution. Given the ongoing safety risk to pedestrians, cyclists and motorists, I would appreciate an update.
